last_episode_to_air.name: Dark Horse
last_episode_to_air.overview: Will goes missing; Kit discovers the truth about her mother.

name: Ride
overview: The adventures of Katherine ' Kit' Bridges who relocates to England when her father joins the faculty at Covington Academy, an elite equestrian boarding school.

episodes.name: Arrival
episodes.overview: Kit is thrilled to be at The Covington Academy until she realizes she'll be expected to conquer her biggest fear - riding a horse. But after bonding with TK, a difficult horse at the Academy, she'll do whatever it takes to stay.

episodes.name: Dresses and Dressage
episodes.overview: Kit has to find a way to ride TK; Elaine will do anything to win; Will and Nav want to ask Kit to the Gala.

episodes.name: Hippophobia and Ophidiophobia
episodes.overview: Kit is running out of time to conquer her fear; Anya tries to be more independent; Will and Nav compete.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Kit almost misses an appointment and blames Elaine; Anya and Nav go overboard on a project.

episodes.name: Gone Guy
episodes.overview: Elaine struggles to balance her duties and Kit's training; the boys want to win a competition; Anya panics.

episodes.name: Wild Horses
episodes.overview: After an accident, Kit struggles to regain TK's trust; Anya reveals a secret.

episodes.name: One Lump or Two
episodes.overview: Kit has a hard time forgiving Will; Kit wants to throw an American tea party for Lady Covington.

episodes.name: Happy UnBirthday
episodes.overview: Will tries to fix things with Kit; Anya worries about attending a royal ball.

episodes.name: After The Ball
episodes.overview: Kit and Anya get into a fight after Kit learns of Anya's secret; Will trains Josh for the House Cup.

episodes.name: The Cup
episodes.overview: Kit and TK try to win the House Cup after most of Rose Cottage gets food poisoning; Kit discovers who has been leaving notes for her.

episodes.name: Stalled
episodes.overview: Nav, Josh, Peaches and Kit work together to get TK back after he's taken away; Will accidentally makes things worse with Kit.

episodes.name: Who Rules The School?
episodes.overview: Kit is told that she must ride, or risk being expelled; Kit begins to question what she knows about her mother; Rudy takes the boys camping.

episodes.name: We Need To Talk About Covington
episodes.overview: Kit reveals more than she should to a journalist; Will faces expulsion; Nav tries to fix a roommate problem.

episodes.name: Come Horse or High Water
episodes.overview: Kit and Nav go in search of TK; a surprise party doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: TK Returns
episodes.overview: Kit must convince Lady Covington to let her compete in the Gala race; Josh and Anya try to improve their rankings; Nav's cousin visits.

episodes.name: Pros & Cons
episodes.overview: Rudy receives a job offer; Kit considers leaving Covington after a magazine article comes out; a devastating discovery.

episodes.name: Trading Horses
episodes.overview: Kit helps Elaine find a new horse for the Gala; Elaine agrees to help Kate solve a mystery; the guys help Will study.

episodes.name: Distractions & Deceptions
episodes.overview: Elaine finds a treasure map that leads to more clues about Kit's mom; Nav tries to hide a knee injury.

episodes.name: Let It Ride
episodes.overview: Lady Covington strikes a bargain with Kit; a student faces consequences.

episodes.name: Dark Horse
episodes.overview: Will goes missing; Kit discovers the truth about her mother.
